context: Redfin was tech-enabled brokerage offering lower commissions and better online tools. Company acquired Lovely in October 2010. Zillow went public in 2011. Traditional brokerages were primary competition.

competitors.name: Zillow
competitors.notes: Real estate portal with Zestimate valuations, went public 2011

competitors.name: Trulia
competitors.notes: Real estate listings portal, main Zillow rival

competitors.name: ZipRealty
competitors.notes: Online brokerage competitor, later acquired by Realogy
